string.text: We've been caught by mercenaries and forced to play their game: out of ten stalkers, only one is to survive. I seem to have no choice.
Escape with the unknown fighter onto the surface
It's strange that the unknown fighter didn't kill me on the spot as I was climbing the stairs... I should follow him to get out of this damn underground area.

The unknown combatant vanished without a trace when the bullet hit him. Down the line, I need to be as careful as possible with him, though right now it's time to get out of here — he told me about some hole.
